$$ 
  X+2Y \leq 16??
  2X+3Y \leq 9??
  X+Y \leq 8??
  find \ out\ max(5X+7Y)\
$$


```{r}
library(lpSolve)
f.obj <- c(5,7)
f.con <- matrix(c(1,2,
                  2,3,
                  1,1), nrow=3)
f.dir <- c('<=',
           '<=',
           '<=')
f.rhs <- c(16,9,8)
lp('max', f.obj, f.con,f.dir,f.rhs)
lp('max', f.obj, f.con,f.dir,f.rhs)$solution
```
